Register. Huch.

Dear interested viewer,
Until recently you could find our registration form here. However, due to high demand we had to stop the registration for now. We hope that we will be able to reopen it again eventually.

If you want to stay informed about the registration process and our programme please subscribe to our newsletter. Just follow the penguin’s beak.
